name: EsCargo - Steam Build
description:
Download this fill and extract the contents. Add Escargo.exe as an external steam game and launch from steam. Have one player press the "Host Lobby" button, then the others should be able to join from the steam in-game overlay. Note - there are currently latency issues that I am working to figure out for the other clients, but the connections part is working for now.

This game can also be played solo in steam. 

Controls:

WASD to move

E to pick up items

Q to throw

R to cycle through highlighted items
